JOB RESPONSIBILITY: 

Comply with safety law, norms and standards, work permit system
safe work procedure.

Coordinate  the  safety  activities  between  the  owner  and  Sub-
contractor. 

Review and approve the sub-contractor's Safety procedure, advice
and recommend any corrective measures.                           

Be familiar  with State and Statutory  Legislation and site safety
rules and guidelines.                                      

Making report and investigation of all near misses, incidents, or
any accidents.

Ensure  that  Personal  Protective  equipment  Complies  with  all
Standards Codes and regulations as per required by laws.

Ensuring that safety equipments (incl. Fire-fighting equipment) are
always  ready  for  use,  monitor  expiry  dates  and  inspection
requirements.

To prepare monthly HSE reports and check list and submit to client
on date as agreed.

To check the up keeping of tools, tackles, Lifting gears with the
help of Companies.

To promote safety consciousness at site among work force.        

Monitor and guide the workforce in the assigned area on general
safety rules and safe work practices.

Inspection for unsafe acts and unsafe conditions in the assigned
area and report to HSE Manager.

Confined Space   check entry permit before one enters confined
space for adequate light and ventilation. 
Page 2 of 2

Aim: Our main concern is to minimize the gap between the knowledge
and implementation of knowledge while working. If we can fill this gap
fully, we will be able to achieve the target of zero accident and then we
can say “Our work area is SAFE”
